info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 01 at 5:03PM PDT until August 01 at 8:15PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Northwestern Clark County in southern Nevada... * Until 815 PM PDT. * At 503 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain near Harris Springs...or just south of the Mt Charleston area. Between 0.5 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional thunderstorms continue to develop and flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Las Vegas, Rainbow Canyon, Mt. Charleston, Spring Mountains, Centennial Hills, Hilltop Campground, Mahogany Grove Campground, Kyle Canyon Campground, Fletcher View Campground, Mary Jane Falls Campground, Dolomite Campground and Mcwilliams Campground. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
